channel.title: WebConfs - A blog about web conferences
channel.description: A blog about my favorite web conferences.

item.title: SassConf
item.description:
SassConf is an awesome 2 day weekend conference for front-end developers and designrs who love Sass and are passionate about building better and more beautiful web sites.

This year, the conference is held in Austin, TX!

item.title: Treehouse Meetups
item.description: This is a post about all the awesome Treehouse meetups out there!

item.title: Camp Sasser
item.description:
Camp Sass is a one-day, one-track Sass conference held in Atlanta, GA. It’s hosted by Hampton Catlin, the inventor of Sass!

At this year’s conference, I had lots of fun, learned a ton, and met many talented web designers and deveopers.
